exercise.rubric: Complete the email with the correct words.

questions.sentence: I don't [know] how to use the new computer system.
I'm trying to [enter] the company intranet site, but I'm having problems.
Firstly, I [click] on 'ENTER' and it asks for my password.
Then I [key] in my password but it doesn't work.
And, finally, when I press HELP, it [asks] for my password again!
